[TABLE from 1. Annual Report 2023-24.pdf, Page 73]
                                                                                               0                         1                       2                                                   3
                                                           responses  of  surveys  are  compiled                                                in the  form  of  a  report  and  shared  with  senior
management  for  review  and  with  relevant  authority  for  corrective  action.  Frequency  of                                                                                                      
                                        conduction of these surveys is given in the table below.                                                                                                      
                                                                                             No.                    Survey             Stakeholder                                           Frequency
                                                                                              1.          Course & Teacher        Current Students                                    Twice a semester
                                                                                                 Evaluation by the Student                                                                            
                                                                                              2.     Faculty Course Review        Current Students                                     Once a semester
                                                                                                                    Report                                                                            
                                                                                              3.  Research Progress Review        Current Students                                     Once a semester
                                                                                                                    Report                                                                            
                                                                                              4.   Department Offering PhD      Head of Department                                         Once a Year
                                                                                                                   Program                                                                            
                                                                                              5. Graduating Student Survey     Graduating Students                                         Once a Year
                                                                                              6.             Alumni Survey            Old Students                                 Continuous Activity
                                                                                              7.           Employer Survey       Employer of NUCES                                 Continuous Activity
                                                                                                                                         Graduates                                                    
                                                                                              8.            Faculty Survey         Faculty Members                                         Once a Year
                                                                                              9.              Staff Survey           Staff Members                                         Once a Year
                                                                                             10.          Exams Assessment Superintendent and Head                               Trice a semester (for
                                                                                                                                       Invigilator                                         every exam)
                                                                                             11.       Fresh Intake Survey   Students of New Batch                                         Once a Year
                                                                                             12.         Facilities Survey        Current Students                                         Once a Year
